channel.title: How do I add Dragon axe special?
channel.description: How do I add the dragon axe special with out adding it to all axes?

item.title: How do I add Dragon axe special?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

How was that basicly a spam post? I gave him the general place to look. Where i told him to look it gives some examples of it which can’t really be that hard to figure out. If he copied some other special like dragon long and just changed the ID to dragon axe then he’s got it…

It wasn’t a spam post…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add Dragon axe special?

item.title: How do I add Dragon axe special?
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

Tbh, i don't really know how it works but you need to search something like "specialAmout" and it shows you some specials already... I bet you're smart, you could probably figure it out:)

That was basically a spam post if you dont know then dont reply.

on topic search mopar for dragon axe gfx, or something near that. Then, search “special” in client.java and find the dragon scimitar in there. copy that and paste it above and change the item id to dragon axes and change spec gfx to dragon axes. then search for the d scim id again and copy and paste it above again, and change the id to dragon axes.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

doughboy:

How do I add the dragon axe special with out adding it to all axes?

Tbh, i don’t really know how it works but you need to search something like “specialAmout” and it shows you some specials already… I bet you’re smart, you could probably figure it out:)
